LongCopy: The Directorate maintains discipline when others fail. Professional military structure. Reliable equipment. Join the force that will rebuild civilization from the ashes.
Pre-cascade military excellence adapted for post-cascade reality. We hold the line against chaos. Service guarantees stability.
One person's wreck is another's fortune. The Vultures Union turns junk into power. Join the crews that make the impossible work.
Quick hands and sharp eyes find treasure in ruins. The Union teaches you to see value where others see waste.
Professional. Reliable. Results-oriented. Free 77 mercenaries deliver on every contract. Independent operators welcome.
Born on the evacuation roads, forged in the post-cascade fire. Free contractors for a free world.
The Corporate Combine leads humanity's technological renaissance. Advanced Hybrid systems. Cutting-edge research. The future, today.
Human ingenuity meets Harvester innovation. Join the force that will master the technology of tomorrow.
Mobile cities. Moving markets. Rolling homes. The Nomad Clans keep the world connected.
Why settle when you can roam? The convoy lifestyle offers independence and adventure.
The Vaulted Archivists guard humanity's intellectual heritage. Libraries in the wasteland. Wisdom from the ruins.
True power comes from comprehension. We study what others simply exploit.
Community protection. Civilian safety. Mutual aid. The Civic Wardens defend those who cannot defend themselves.
Violence breeds more violence. The Wardens offer mediation and protection.
